docs.text: linkml-tutorial Learning how to use LinkML URI: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial Name: linkml-tutorial Classes Class Description Animal A specific animal AnimalCollection A group of animals NamedThing A generic entity that has its own name Person A specific person PersonCollection A group of people Slots Slot Description age_in_years Number of trips around the sun experienced by an individual animals A collection of animals that live with a person birth_date Date on which an individual was born breed Characteristic or strain or subspecies or variant color Characteristic exterior color of an animal entities A collection of people household_members A list of cohabitating creatures id Unique identifier for the individual name Proper noun referring to the object pets A group of companion animals primary_email Primary address for electronic mail species Taxonomic species of an animal vital_status Alive or Dead? weight_in_mgs Weight of an animal, measured in milligrams Enumerations Enumeration Description Breeds Collection of known breeds PersonStatus Vital status of a person Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
